definitions.body: product, yield, usually of earth (= crops, etc.) [[הָאָרֶץ]] ´[[תּ]] Ex 23:10, Le 19:25, Le 23:29, Le 25:3, Le 25:7 (used as food for man & beast, cf. v:Le 25:22) Jos 5:12, cf. Ne 9:37, Le 25:15, Le 25:16, also Ez Eze 48:18; in Ge 47:24 ´[[בַּתּ]] must = of the crops ([[בּ]] partitive, cf. [[בְּ]]

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: income, revenue, in general Job 31:12 (almost = possessions) Pr 10:16, Pr 14:4, Pr 15:6, Pr 16:8, Ec 5:9 cf. Is 23:3 (revenue of Tyre from trade with Egypt in bread stuffs).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: fig. gain of wisdom [[חָכְמָה]] ´[[תּ]] Pr 3:14, Pr 8:19; product of lips ([[שְׂפָתָיו]] ´[[תּ]]) Pr 18:20, i.e. results of his speech (‖[[פְּרִי פִי־אִישׁ]]); of Isr. as Yahweh's product Je 2:3; of Israel's wickedness Je 12:13.
